For westbound Green Line C branch service to St. Mary's and beyond, please board shuttle buses at Kenmore, disembark at St. Mary's, and board regular Green Line C branch train service. For eastbound Green Line C branch service to Kenmore and beyond, please board shuttle buses at St. Mary's, remain on the bus at Fenway, disembark at Kenmore, and board regular Green Line trolley service. 

For westbound Green Line D branch service to Fenway and beyond, please board shuttle buses at Kenmore, remain on the bus at St. Mary's, disembark at Fenway on Park Drive, and board regular Green Line D branch train service. For eastbound Green Line D branch service to Kenmore and beyond, please board shuttle buses at Fenway on Park Drive, disembark at Kenmore, and board regular Green Line trolley service. 

Regular Green Line C branch and D branch trolley service will resume at the start of service on Monday, April 24, 2017. All shuttle bus stops are accessible for persons with disabilities.
